title: The Spectator Christmas Carol Service 2015
desc: Join us for the annual   Christmas Carol Service at St Bride's Church, Fleet Street on Wednesday 9 December 2015. Get into the festive spirit with?beautiful music from the choir of St Bride?s and readings from   contributors within the stunning Sir Christopher Wren designed church of St Bride?s, known worldwide as the Journalists? Church. Then join us for mulled wine after the service. All proceeds will go towards Macmillan Cancer Support.
